Package io.atomix.core.tree

Interface AtomicDocumentTree<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - document tree value type
    All Superinterfaces:
    DistributedPrimitive, SyncPrimitive
    public interface AtomicDocumentTree<V>
extends SyncPrimitive
    A hierarchical document tree data structure.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface io.atomix.primitive.DistributedPrimitive

        DEFAULT_OPERATION_TIMEOUT_MILLIS

      • getChildren

        default Map<String,​Versioned<V>> getChildren​(String path)
        Returns the child values for this node.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the node, must be prefixed with the root / path
        Returns:
        mapping from a child name to its value
        Throws:
        NoSuchDocumentPathException - if the path does not point to a valid node
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given path does not start at root /

      • set

        default Versioned<V> set​(String path,
                         V value)
        Creates or updates a document tree node.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the node to create or update, must be prefixed with the root / path
        value - the non-null value to be associated with the key
        Returns:
        the previous mapping or null if there was no previous mapping
        Throws:
        NoSuchDocumentPathException - if the parent node (for the node to create/update) does not exist
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given path does not start at root /

      • create

        default boolean create​(String path,
                       V value)
        Creates a document tree node if one does not exist already.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the node to create, must be prefixed with the root / path
        value - the non-null value to be associated with the key
        Returns:
        returns true if the mapping could be added successfully, false otherwise
        Throws:
        NoSuchDocumentPathException - if the parent node (for the node to create) does not exist
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given path does not start at root /

      • create

        boolean create​(DocumentPath path,
               V value)
        Creates a document tree node if one does not exist already.
        Parameters:
        path - path for the node to create
        value - the non-null value to be associated with the key
        Returns:
        returns true if the mapping could be added successfully, false otherwise
        Throws:
        NoSuchDocumentPathException - if the parent node (for the node to create) does not exist
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given path does not start at root /

      • createRecursive

        default boolean createRecursive​(String path,
                                V value)
        Creates a document tree node by first creating any missing intermediate nodes in the path.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the node to create, must be prefixed with the root / path
        value - the non-null value to be associated with the key
        Returns:
        returns true if the mapping could be added successfully, false if a node already exists at that path
        Throws:
        IllegalDocumentModificationException - if path points to root
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given path does not start at root /

      • createRecursive

        boolean createRecursive​(DocumentPath path,
                        V value)
        Creates a document tree node by first creating any missing intermediate nodes in the path.
        Parameters:
        path - path for the node to create
        value - the non-null value to be associated with the key
        Returns:
        returns true if the mapping could be added successfully, false if a node already exists at that path
        Throws:
        IllegalDocumentModificationException - if path points to root
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given path does not start at root /

      • replace

        default boolean replace​(String path,
                        V newValue,
                        long version)
        Conditionally updates a tree node if the current version matches a specified version.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the node to replace, must be prefixed with the root / path
        newValue - the non-null value to be associated with the key
        version - current version of the value for update to occur
        Returns:
        returns true if the update was made and the tree was modified, false otherwise
        Throws:
        NoSuchDocumentPathException - if the parent node (for the node to create) does not exist
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given path does not start at root /

      • replace

        boolean replace​(DocumentPath path,
                V newValue,
                long version)
        Conditionally updates a tree node if the current version matches a specified version.
        Parameters:
        path - path for the node to replace
        newValue - the non-null value to be associated with the key
        version - current version of the value for update to occur
        Returns:
        returns true if the update was made and the tree was modified, false otherwise
        Throws:
        NoSuchDocumentPathException - if the parent node (for the node to create) does not exist
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given path does not start at root /

      • replace

        default boolean replace​(String path,
                        V newValue,
                        V currentValue)
        Conditionally updates a tree node if the current value matches a specified value.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the node to replace, must be prefixed with the root / path
        newValue - the non-null value to be associated with the key
        currentValue - current value for update to occur
        Returns:
        returns true if the update was made and the tree was modified, false otherwise. This method returns false if the newValue and currentValue are same.
        Throws:
        NoSuchDocumentPathException - if the parent node (for the node to create) does not exist
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given path does not start at root /

      • replace

        boolean replace​(DocumentPath path,
                V newValue,
                V currentValue)
        Conditionally updates a tree node if the current value matches a specified value.
        Parameters:
        path - path for the node to create
        newValue - the non-null value to be associated with the key
        currentValue - current value for update to occur
        Returns:
        returns true if the update was made and the tree was modified, false otherwise. This method returns false if the newValue and currentValue are same.
        Throws:
        NoSuchDocumentPathException - if the parent node (for the node to create) does not exist
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given path does not start at root /

      • remove

        default Versioned<V> remove​(String path)
        Removes the node with the specified path.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the node to remove, must be prefixed with the root / path
        Returns:
        the previous value of the node or null if it did not exist
        Throws:
        IllegalDocumentModificationException - if the remove to be removed
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given path does not start at root /

                         DocumentTreeEventListener<V> listener)
        Registers a listener to be notified when a subtree rooted at the specified path is modified.
        Parameters:
        path - path to root of subtree to monitor for updates
        listener - listener to be notified

      • addListener

        default void addListener​(DocumentTreeEventListener<V> listener,
                         Executor executor)
        Registers a listener to be notified when the tree is modified.
        Parameters:
        listener - listener to be notified
        executor - the executor on which to notify the event listener

      • addListener

                 DocumentTreeEventListener<V> listener,
                 Executor executor)
        Registers a listener to be notified when a subtree rooted at the specified path is modified.
        Parameters:
        path - path to root of subtree to monitor for updates
        listener - listener to be notified
        executor - the executor on which to notify the event listener
